results.title: Metformin's mechanism in reducing oxidative stress and promoting bone regeneration in T2DM rat BMMSCs: a focus on NRF2-GPX7 signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: In vivo experiments showed that ML385 completely inhibited the combined promoting effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ and Tr-BMMSCs on the @<m>DISEASE_Mandibular_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008338 @@@mandibular defect@@@ regeneration in T2DM @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
